h4.a: Governor's Executive Order for Phased reopening of businesses

div.div: Gov. Brian Kemp issued an executive order to reopen businesses for “baseline operations” Friday citing data that suggests Georgia is on track to meet White House guidelines to restart the state’s economy. Read on...

h4.a: Governor Kemp Announces Georgia Public Health Emergency Declaration

div.div: Governor Kemp just declared a Public Health Emergency for the State of Georgia. This is the first time in recorded history that Georgia has ever issued such a declaration. The best way to stop the spread of COVID-19 is social distancing. Read on...
The Georgia Department of Public Health Statement COVID-19 Read on...
